title: The Mirror of Galadriel, Dangerous Guide (15R22)
text:
Set:	The Hunters

Game Text:	To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.
Rarity:	R
